CustomField.formula: CASE( vlocity_ps__Frequency__c , 'Hourly', vlocity_ps__Amount__c * 520/3, 'Daily', vlocity_ps__Amount__c * 5*52/12, 'Weekly', vlocity_ps__Amount__c * 52/12, 'Bi-Weekly', vlocity_ps__Amount__c * 26/12, 'Yearly', vlocity_ps__Amount__c * 1/12, vlocity_ps__Amount__c )
CustomField.label: Monthly Amount
